verbose_text: In response to pathogens that trigger COPD exacerbations (influenza A virus, respiratory syncytial virus, Staphylococcus aureus, non typeable Haemophilus influenzae), mouse ILC2s substantially lowered their expression of the transcription factor GATA-3, exhibited an increase in expression of T-bet and switched to interferon-gamma-producing ILC1s.
evidence: expression of the transcription factor GATA-3
